name: Survivor Shark
description:
Avoid the explosives! Addicting arcade-style game that is themed around nature's most fearsome creatures, sharks.

Drag your shark along the screen to dodge mines and torpedoes. Collect the spinning orbs to acquire powerups! Earn coins by playing and use coins to upgrade your powerups and reach even higher scores! Coins can also be used to unlock new shark characters, which give you an extra advantage!

Explosives fall faster the longer you play. See how long you can survive!
